entries.description: Fix 'Enable Share Cluster' button in admin settings.
Fix listing events for external clusters.
Fix an issue where 'clusterDefaultNodeSelector' label was being added back on opening of edit cluster dialog.
Fix CPU Utilization graph showing no data for User Cluster MLA dashboard 'Nodes Overview'.
Fix empty panels in Grafana dashboard 'Resource Usage per Namespace' for Master/Seed MLA.
